ValidationRule.description: Requires a value to be entered in the Billing Schedule Change Justification field if a value other than the default is entered in Billing Schedule.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(Quote_Business_Group__c="Barracuda", TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Special Billing Schedule Request", ISBLANK(Billing_Schedule_Change_Justification__c)), AND(Quote_Business_Group__c="Sonian", TEXT(Billing_Schedule__c)="Annual", ISBLANK(Billing_Schedule_Change_Justification__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Justification for the Billing Schedule change requested on this Quote.
